author: smor
msg: Now, the AskTag belongs to Jelly ! That was a quick add and remove ! :)

author: smor
msg: Now, the AskTag will consider any number of spaces as an empty string

author: smor
msg: Introduced an AskTag, that asks the user a question and stores the answer in
a variable.
Eg:
<ask question="Where do you want to install Maven ?"
answer="ask.tag.answer"
default="/usr/local/maven"/>
will output this :
Where do you want to install Maven ? [/usr/local/maven]
/home/foo/maven
This will put the "/home/foo/maven" in a ${ask.tag.answer}, and will use
"/usr/local/maven" if empty.
There is also a "prompt" attribute that doesn't work yet :(
It prints the prompt after the user's input ...
There is a new useless "ask" goal that asks for your name, in maven.xml,
it is simply for testing !

author: glennm
msg: Glenn McAllister - 2002/07/12
- Tidied up some of the file copying.
- The only jar explcitly copied into the binary distribution is now
${maven.final.name}.jar.  Previously, any .jar file in ${maven.build.dir} was
copied over.
- When creating the src distribution, if there isn't a build.xml file one is
created by attaining the ant:generate-build goal.
NOTE: This does introduce a dependency on the ant plugin, which may or may
not be a good thing.

author: plynch
msg: o Adjusting descriptions for nice display with '-g'
